data.name: ENDLESS™ Space 2 - Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Concept Art, 3D Renders and Illustrations!

More than 120 pages of pure art covering almost everything our artists have drawn for Endless Space 2 and all its updates.

Developer Commentary

Our Narrative Director (Jeff Spock) comments on how each element in the game, from the heroes to the monsters, were created and adapted to enrich and fit our Endless Universe.


NOTE: To access the Digital Artbook:
1. Right click "Endless Space 2" in the Steam Library
2. Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
3. Open the "Artbook" folder
data.about_the_game:
Concept Art, 3D Renders and Illustrations!

More than 120 pages of pure art covering almost everything our artists have drawn for Endless Space 2 and all its updates.

Developer Commentary

Our Narrative Director (Jeff Spock) comments on how each element in the game, from the heroes to the monsters, were created and adapted to enrich and fit our Endless Universe.


NOTE: To access the Digital Artbook:
1. Right click "Endless Space 2" in the Steam Library
2. Go to Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files
3. Open the "Artbook" folder
data.short_description: The Art of Endless Space 2 is a 120+ page Digital Artbook that includes all the design and pixel art works from our talented artists, commented by our Narrative Director.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 4th generation / i5 2nd generation / A6 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series / NVidia 550Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 5th generation (or newer) / i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 775M | Radeon HD 6970 | Intel Iris Pro
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
